Package edu.kit.kastel.mcse.ardoco.core.common.util

Class CommonTextToolsConfig

java.lang.Object
edu.kit.kastel.mcse.ardoco.core.common.util.CommonTextToolsConfig
public final class CommonTextToolsConfig extends Object
The Class CommonTextToolsConfig defines the configuration for the common text tools.
